translations: v．喘气，气喘吁吁：因劳累、紧张或兴奋而急促地呼吸。

sentences.sentence: "I have been as quick as I could," she panted.
sentences.translation: “我已经尽可能快了。”她喘着气说。

sentences.sentence: He gasped, as he panted along, "what an ASS I am!"
sentences.translation: 他气喘吁吁，边喘边说：“我真是头蠢驴！”

sentences.sentence: Alice panted as she ran; but the Gryphon only answered, "Come on!"
sentences.translation: 爱丽丝一边跑一边喘着气。但鹰头怪只是说：“快点！”
